item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, February 14, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. JD Vance hits out at Europe’s ‘threat from within’
2. Europe must respond to Trump ‘electroshock’, says Macron
3. [Opinion] Trump has put the ball back in Putin’s court on Ukraine
4. Arm to launch its own chip in move that could upend semiconductor industry
5. UK refuses to release details of Thiel’s meeting with former minister
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, February 14, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
